definition: down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to arrive/most/to/until
down to/up to/to the extent that...

sentences.english: I can't, I can't do this. I'm so excited that I can't eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我實在太興奮了，以至於我都沒法喫午餐了。

sentences.english: But even this prayer the tree didn't hvaccept the separ.
sentences.chinese: 可是以至這個乞求樹也沒有注意。

sentences.english: The wall is so short that they can climb over.
sentences.chinese: 這堵牆矮到如此程度，以至於他們可以爬過去。

sentences.english: She was so sleepy that she ran into a lamppost.
sentences.chinese: 她太困了以至於撞到了路燈杆上。

sentences.english: Transformations are so simple as to be almost trivial.
sentences.chinese: 轉換如此簡單，以至於有點微不足道。

sentences.english: It's such a heretical idea that it's not even up for discussion.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個如此異端的想法，以至於它根本不會被討論。

sentences.english: I am sorry. I was too shock to do so.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，我當時驚嚇過度以至於沒有留意到。

sentences.english: They should not be left lying around, they are sure to get wrinkled and soiled.
sentences.chinese: 不要隨意亂放，以至於弄得又縐又髒。

sentences.english: The movements he made were so comical that I was hard put to it not to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他作出的動作是如此的滑稽以至於我忍不住大笑。

sentences.english: The reactions of the amygdala are so quick that they are for all intents automatic.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁核的反應是如此之快以至於它們幾乎是無意識的。

sentences.english: Answer:1. He made such rapid progress that he passed the exam. 2.
sentences.chinese: 他進步如此的快以至於通過了這次考試。

sentences.english: Mr Jeremy Fisher even had some Quotable Quotes which he had written down along the way.
sentences.chinese: 傑里米教師以至寫上了一些他一路所記的名言雋語。

sentences.english: Gas diffusion makes reserves of gas reservoirs decrease and exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣擴散作用使氣藏儲量逐漸減小，以至估竭。

sentences.english: Water is held so tenaciously that most plant root systems cannot absorb it.
sentences.chinese: 水被牢牢地吸住以至於不能被大多數植物根系吸收。

sentences.english: She is so weak that she can't do this job.
sentences.chinese: 她身體是那麼的瘦弱以至於不能做這份工作。

sentences.english: So crowded is this bus that I can hardly breathe.
sentences.chinese: 車上如此擁擠以至於我幾乎喘不動氣。

definition: to such an extent as to/down to/up to
even/so much so that
so much so that/to the extent that/even
for this reason
by the time that
almost
even/going as far as to/so much so that
none doesn't/there is none who isn't/everyone
to cause/to result in
simply because/all because
not in such a way as to/not likely to
for fear that/lest/also written 唯恐
(literary) moreover/in addition
not only
therefore
that being the case/then/in that case
